snippet: Police Officer Ali Oklu, who will report to prison to begin a 46-month sentence, wishes he had never accepted a colleague’s offer of a “side job.”
abstract: New York City police officer Ali Oklu is set to begin a 46-month sentence for transporting array of contraband, including untaxed cigarettes and guns, at the direction of undercover federal agents; arrest is part of a sting that is being hailed as one of the largest corruption cases involving city police officers in years.
lead_paragraph: Police Officer Ali Oklu, who will report to prison to begin a 46-month sentence, wishes he had never accepted a colleague’s offer of a “side job.”

headline.seo: Facing Years in Jail, Officer in Gun Scheme Has Regrets
headline.main: Facing Years in Jail, Officer in Gun Scheme Has Regrets
headline.print_headline: Facing Years in Jail, Officer In Gun Scheme Has Regrets
